page.title: 05THE GOINGS ON IN OUR AREA
page.content: Our area has garden centres such as Milton Hutchings and Packetboat Nurseries. The area is mostly residential. For leisure there is a youth club. It has a hall which has different things on each night,for instance there are discos for the older generation as well as the young. Opposite the youth club there is The Irish Club where you can enjoy Irish music and dancing. Opposite Birch Avenue modern flats are being demolished because they were badly built. It is possible that the site of the flats will be used to create new leisure facilities,but at present the land is derelict.Opposite Pield Heath School is the River Pinn which is used by local fishing enthusiasts.
